title: Silver V (LFT) or people to make a team.
body:
Hey guys, looking for some chilled out people to play with and enjoy the game. If that's you then join a ranked team with me and learn and climb the league as a team, a unit, a family. You may think wtf is this kid on... ikr, but if you're like me and want to enjoy the game and have a competitive edge then add me IGN: Cymru

Little bit about me:

20 years of age.
Prefer the bot lane mostly ADC
willing to learn i'm no expert
Have fun :)

See you on the rift.

replies.body:
I'm interested for a casual game.
Top or sup pref, but can play all.
I'm interested in playing ranked mainly for the fun of it, but also to learn more about the game. I mainly Supp and ADC, but can Top if need be. I'm Silver 4. (:
I not long ago got silver 5 and look like climbing further. I main ADC though so if i was going to join a ranked team it would be as that.
add me in game and we shall see from there...

I looking for people to make a team and have fun playing with so if your interested add me
My ign is : Lapras2
Ill add you and go from there :)
Dam i only play ap jarvan as adc :? so unless i get adc cant be done :(
